div.p:
- Hey, what up?
That's Adrian.

- This is Gwen.
- That's Tom.
- And this is Tony.
- We are the band No Doubt.
- [singing] One more summer
One more weekend

We were just trying to make
a great record

that had all of the inspirations
that we love

and just be really modern,
where we're at right now.

- When we were inspired,
we knew we were on to something.

- [singing] Oh-oh-oh,
oh-oh-oh, oh

I think we feel really excited
to do this commercial today,
because it's a big deal.

They chose us.
It's crazy, right?
We love Target.

The idea of having
this special edition

and being able to do, like,
a little mini video

to go with a song that we love
called "One More Summer"
has been really exciting.
Working with Target,

you always know you're gonna get
something great,

because everyone's so into it
and motivated and inspired.

- The Target exclusive edition
of "Push and Shove"

will be available
September 25th.
